title: Bielinek
text:
Bielinek () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Cedynia">Gmina Cedynia</a>, within <a href="Gryfino%20County">Gryfino County</a>, <a href="West%20Pomeranian%20Voivodeship">West Pomeranian Voivodeship</a>, in north-western Poland, close to the <a href="Germany">German</a> border. It lies approximately north-west of <a href="Cedynia">Cedynia</a>, south-west of <a href="Gryfino">Gryfino</a>, and south-west of the regional capital <a href="Szczecin">Szczecin</a>.
Before 1945 the area was part of <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. For the history of the region, see <a href="History%20of%20Pomerania">History of Pomerania</a>.
The village has a population of 210.
References.
